summary: This document is a compilation of daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for July 27-28, 2019. It details routine prison operations, counts, and inmate statuses, most notably recording that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on 'Psych Obs' (psychological observation) or 'Suicide Watch' with an inmate companion during this period, which was just over two weeks before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054, noted to be on psychological observation/suicide watch with an inmate companion in the MCC logs.

persons.name: Nelendez
persons.context: Inmate #85799-054 noted as being at a local hospital with institutional staff or USMS guards.

persons.name: Carrillo
persons.context: Inmate #86996-054 placed in administrative detention in the Special Housing Unit pending an SIS (Special Investigative Services) investigation.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Inmate #76254-054 noted as being at the Goldcrest nursing facility with USMS guards.

persons.name: Lans
persons.context: Inmate #86357-054 involved in an unwitnessed fight, required EMT assistance, and was transported to the hospital.

persons.name: Fuentes
persons.context: Inmate #86368-054 removed from general population to a special unit (ZA) following a fight.

persons.name: Chaplin Munn
persons.context: Mentioned as the chaplain who cancelled the religious service on July 28, 2019.

connections.description: The log repeatedly notes Epstein was on psychological observation/suicide watch 'w/inmate companion'.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: The evening watch log for July 27, 2019, records inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) as being on 'Suicide Watch' with an inmate companion.

events.title: Epstein on Psychological Observation
events.description: The morning and day watch logs for July 28, 2019, record inmate Jeffrey Epstein as being on 'Psych Obs' (psychological observation) with an inmate companion.

events.title: Inmate Fight and Hospital Transport
events.description: An unwitnessed fight occurred involving inmates Lans and Fuentes. Lans required EMT transport to the hospital.

events.title: Inmate Placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: Inmate Carrillo was placed in the Special Housing Unit (Administrative Detention) pending an SIS investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was documented as being on 'Suicide Watch' on July 27, 2019, and on 'Psych Obs' (psychological observation) on July 28, 2019, while incarcerated at the MCC.
Epstein was noted to have an 'inmate companion' while on suicide watch/psychological observation.
The logs document significant operational issues at the MCC, including inoperable fire alarm and sprinkler systems, requiring a manual fire watch.
The logs were created just over two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
Multiple other inmates are documented in the logs for medical issues, fights, and administrative detention, showing general prison activity alongside Epstein's status.
